dmca.title: Copyright infringement in violation of Title 17 U.S. Code
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Wednesday, February 28, 2007 6:43 AM To: DMCA Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3272235K] Copyright infringement in violation of Title 17 U.S. Code ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. boundary="----=_Part_7236_11855262.1172687547499" X-Virus-Scanned: by Barracuda Spam Firewall at ev1servers.net X-Barracuda-Spam-Score: 0.00 X-Barracuda-Spam-Status: No, SCORE=0.00 using global scores of TAG_LEVEL=4.0 QUARANTINE_LEVEL=1000.0 KILL_LEVEL=8.0 WHITELISTED Return-Path: vadim.platonov@gmail.com X-OriginalArrivalTime: 28 Feb 2007 18:32:43.0856 (UTC) FILETIME=[D6017500:01C75B66] (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) Sky Ventures, Inc. Sky Ventures 11705 Dinwiddie Drive Rockville, MD 20852 +1.2404828739 23288@whois.gkg.net To whom it may concern, My name is Ms. Berthrane Cartright. It has come to my attention that material (the work called Haiti) posted on varsityessays.com is my sole property; I created and copyrighted said material. The unauthorized copying and distribution via the internet of the aforementioned material, without my expressed permission constitutes copyright infringement in violation of Title 17 U.S. Code, Section 106(a) of the Copyright Act of 1976, and several recognized international copyright laws. You are hereby to immediately CEASE AND DESIST the posting of my work any other material copyrighted by me. You are to immediately inform myself once you have complied with the aforementioned request. If you do not comply, I intend to prosecute you to the furthest extent of the law. The consequences of your lack of cooperation in this matter may result in civil fines, including but not limited to attorney fees, penalties and prosecution by the U.S. Attorney's office for willful violation of Copyright Laws. This is the link to my copyrighted material on your website: http://www.varsityessays.com/essays/32007.html Sincerely, Berthrane Cartright Malden, MA 02148 vadim.platonov@gmail.com CC: Everyones Internet 390 Benmar Suite 200 Houston, TX 77060 abuse@ev1servers.net CC: United States Attorneys Office Michael J. To whom it may concern,

 

My name is Ms. Berthrane Cartright.  It has come to my attention that material (the work called Haiti) posted on varsityessays.com is my sole property; I created and copyrighted said material.

The unauthorized copying and distribution via the internet of the aforementioned material, without my expressed permission constitutes copyright infringement in violation of Title 17 U.S. Code, Section 106(a) of the Copyright Act of 1976, and several recognized international copyright laws.

You are hereby to immediately CEASE AND DESIST the posting of my work any other material copyrighted by me.  You are to immediately inform myself once you have complied with the aforementioned request.

If you do not comply, I intend to prosecute you to the furthest extent of the law.  The consequences of your lack of cooperation in this matter may result in civil fines, including but not limited to attorney fees, penalties and prosecution by the U.S. Attorney's office for willful violation of Copyright Laws.

 

This is the link to my copyrighted material on your website:

http://www.varsity essays.com/essays/32007.html
